@.BONE.

Don't use VLC, it's pretty buggy.  Use KMP, it play HD videos much, much smoother and has a higher tolerance than VLC, for errors in encodes. 

Keep in mind that VLC, was never really meant to be a general purpose media player!

Download KMP, here: http://www.filehippo.com/download_kmplayer/

Also, make sure to "opt-out" of the Ask toolbar crap.

@lucky

This movie is a great film. Its not really intended for children. Its more of a relax based movie. Just something to watch. Not to get all excited about. It is really funny is a British way. Well that's exactly what it is British humor.

On a side note, my kids had no problems understanding the humor and they enjoyed it. Its hard keeping a class of 5 year old' still. This movie did it. Better than Sponge Bob that's for sure. That junk will make kids stupid.
